title: Sentinel's Mark
data:
{{version031}}
{{flavour|Bestows a strong beacon upon a targeted creature. It announces the presence and location of the marked creature to everyone on the same level.}}

'''Sentinel's Mark''' is a monster-only spell which inflicts the '''Mark''' status, if it overcomes the target's [[willpower]]. This causes all monsters in the level to know your location. Sleeping monsters are not affected by this unless they wake up. Quaffing a [[potion of cancellation]] will dispel the status.

You can also gain the Mark status when an [[alarm trap]] is triggered; this effect ignores your willpower and makes a very loud [[noise]].

{{monsters with spell}}

==History==
*Prior to [[0.26]], [[pandemonium lord]]s couldn't cast this spell.
*Prior to [[0.16]], its [[spell power]] didn't depend on the attacker's [[HD]] and was always 125.
*This spell was added in [[0.12]].
